column4: hi i need a bit of help im trying to make iso out of windows dvd than run it in vmware i used power is to make iso then tried to start it in vmware it say s not bootable any advice ?
a simple « sudo dd if=/dev/dvd of=/path/to/windows_img.iso » wont work ?
i would redo the iso. maybe you missed some option  in the program (poweriso or whatever)? or maybe try another program.
do the iso in ubuntu as i told you or using brasero?
